page.title: 06A Primary School
page.content: There are 120 children aged 5-11 years attending{Hankham School}which is now 106 years old.we understand from the East Sussex Record Office that it was listed in the 1895 Sussex Directory as having been built in 1879 for 130 children and formed one of the institutions controled by the Westham and Pevensey School board.There was also a National School supported by subscription of Westham and Pevensey Parishes and built in 1852 to occomodate 100 children.This information was supplied to Hankham School during its centinary year in 19 79 by the East Sussex Record Office on the understanding that "the council does not warrant its accuracy and that they nor any of their officers are legally responsible for any inaccuracies"ect.
